pullRequest.title: Add support for SHOW FUNCTIONS LIKE pattern
pullRequest.bodyText:
== RELEASE NOTES ==

General Changes
* Support listing functions whose names match a specified pattern using the
  SHOW FUNCTION LIKE syntax.

nodes.bodyText: Would predicate = node.getLikePattern.map(pattern -> new LikePredicate(...)) work?

I would break this into multiple lines for readability.
node.getLikePattern().map(pattern -> new LikePredicate(
    identifier("function_name"),
    new StringLiteral(pattern),
    node.getEscape().map(StringLiteral::new))),

commit.message: Add support for SHOW FUNCTIONS LIKE pattern

afterCommit.message: Add support for SHOW FUNCTIONS LIKE pattern
